title: Edutainment-Based ESP Microlearning for Engineering and Technology Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering terminology and basic English proficiency for workplace communication
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive training conducted in a smartphone-based constrained technological environment, emphasizing context-specific English communication skills for solving engineering field problems

learning_goals: Learners can solve work-related problems in English using specialized terminology from engineering and technology fields
Learners can explain complex technical concepts in English through edutainment content (mini-games, simulations)
Learners enhance collaborative English communication skills by participating in problem-solving scenarios provided on mobile platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
